name: Healthyfied Bolognese Sauce
description: This Healthyfied Bolognese Sauce is a low-carb, low-sugar delight that does not compromise on flavor. Perfect for anyone following a healthy lifestyle, this recipe transforms the classic Bolognese into a nutritious meal without losing its hearty essence. A great addition to your collection of Healthy Recipes.
recipeIngredient: 83 g Red capsicum (nutritional info from veggycation)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and finely dice the red capsicum.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced red capsicum to the pan with the beef and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the Barilla alla bolognese sauce and simmer the mixture on low heat, allowing the flavors to meld, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve your Healthyfied Bolognese Sauce hot over your choice of pasta or zucchini noodles for an even lighter option.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
